sqlMap.select: select MPP_ID, PROJ_ID, BRANCH_ID, BATCH_NO, SEQ_NO, DEST_TABLE, SRC_TABLE, PROC_TYPE, PROC_CFG, DUP_PROC_TYPE, ERR_PROC_TYPE, MPP_NAME, COMMENTS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, RSV4, RSV5 from DP_MPP_CFG where MPP_ID = #mppId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into DP_MPP_CFG (MPP_ID, PROJ_ID, BRANCH_ID, BATCH_NO, SEQ_NO, DEST_TABLE, SRC_TABLE, PROC_TYPE, PROC_CFG, DUP_PROC_TYPE, ERR_PROC_TYPE, MPP_NAME, COMMENTS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, RSV4, RSV5) values (#mppId:VARCHAR#, #projId:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #batchNo:DECIMAL#, #seqNo:DECIMAL#, #destTable:VARCHAR#, #srcTable:VARCHAR#, #procType:VARCHAR#, #procCfg:VARCHAR#, #dupProcType:VARCHAR#, #errProcType:VARCHAR#, #mppName:VARCHAR#, #comments:VARCHAR#, #createTime:CHAR#, #createUser:VARCHAR#, #updateTime:CHAR#, #updateUser:VARCHAR#, #rsv1:VARCHAR#, #rsv2:VARCHAR#, #rsv3:VARCHAR#, #rsv4:VARCHAR#, #rsv5:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update DP_MPP_CFG set PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#, BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#, SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#, DEST_TABLE = #destTable:VARCHAR#, SRC_TABLE = #srcTable:VARCHAR#, PROC_TYPE = #procType:VARCHAR#, PROC_CFG = #procCfg:VARCHAR#, DUP_PROC_TYPE = #dupProcType:VARCHAR#, ERR_PROC_TYPE = #errProcType:VARCHAR#, MPP_NAME = #mppName:VARCHAR#, COMMENTS = #comments:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#, CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#, UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime:CHAR#, UPDATE_USER = #updateUser:VARCHAR#, RSV1 = #rsv1:VARCHAR#, RSV2 = #rsv2:VARCHAR#, RSV3 = #rsv3:VARCHAR#, RSV4 = #rsv4:VARCHAR#, RSV5 = #rsv5:VARCHAR# where MPP_ID = #mppId:VARCHAR#

update DP_MPP_CFG
PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#
BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#
SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#
DEST_TABLE = #destTable:VARCHAR#
SRC_TABLE = #srcTable:VARCHAR#
PROC_TYPE = #procType:VARCHAR#
PROC_CFG = #procCfg:VARCHAR#
DUP_PROC_TYPE = #dupProcType:VARCHAR#
ERR_PROC_TYPE = #errProcType:VARCHAR#
MPP_NAME = #mppName:VARCHAR#
COMMENTS = #comments:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#
CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#
UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime:CHAR#
UPDATE_USER = #updateUser:VARCHAR#
where MPP_ID = #mppId:VARCHAR# and UPDATE_USER = #rsv1:VARCHAR# and UPDATE_TIME = #rsv2:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql:
where 1=1
and PROC_TYPE = #procType:VARCHAR#
and BRANCH_ID like '%$branchId$%'
and MPP_NAME like '%$mppName$%'
and DEST_TABLE like '%$destTable$%'
and SRC_TABLE like '%$srcTable$%'
order by PROJ_ID,BRANCH_ID ,BATCH_NO,SEQ_NO
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from DP_MPP_CFG where 1=1
and MPP_ID <> #mppId:VARCHAR#
and PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#
and BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
and BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#
and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#

select count(*) from DP_MPP_CFG where 1=1
and MPP_ID <> #mppId:VARCHAR#
and PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#
and BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
and BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#
and DEST_TABLE = #destTable:VARCHAR#
and SRC_TABLE = #srcTable:VARCHAR#
